step_data.thought: The user wants to hold the selected order. The current page already shows that the order is on hold, as indicated by the message 'You put the order on hold.' and the button turned inactive. Since the order is already on hold, there is no need to take any further action to hold it. I will notify the user that the order is already on hold.
step_data.action: stop('The order is already on hold.')
